Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. We believe in valuing relationships and understanding the unique needs of our esteemed clients. Considering the exceptional quality and benefits this product offers, we are extending a special invitation to you to purchase it at a price of $900,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with significant savings while ensuring you receive the utmost value for your investment. We are confident that this product will exceed your expectations and contribute greatly to your endeavors. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless and personalized experience throughout the transaction process. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $900,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $900,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
